= trackbacks =

List of posts referencing an url.

== Parameters: ==

|| *Name*    || *Required* || *Description* ||
|| url       || required   || URL string for the target. ||
|| contains  || optional   || Query string to filter results. ||
|| tracktype || optional   || Type of trackbacks (defaults to "tweets") ||

Accepts [ResListParameters List Parameters]

== Example: ==

{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/trackbacks.json?url=http://topsy.com/&tracktype=tweet
}}}

This will fetch posts (tweets) in json format that reference Topsy's homepage. It is advised that you explicitly specify tracktype=tweet, which is the only supported tracktype at present, but this will change in future to support other types of references.
